question: Tom has a red ball. It is new. What color is Tom's ball?
Mary lives in Tokyo. She loves the city. Where does Mary live?
This book is very interesting. I read it every day. What do I think of the book?
Ken went to the park and played soccer. What did Ken play?
The cat is on the roof. It cannot come down. Where is the cat?
I have two brothers and one sister. How many brothers do I have?
The teacher gave us homework yesterday. When did we get homework?
Sara likes apples but not bananas. Which fruit does Sara like?
It was raining, so I took an umbrella. Why did I take an umbrella?
John studied hard and passed the test. What happened to John?
